name: Zhong Sun
story: Zhong Sun is a veteran of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who joined the OPFOR as part of a joint military exercise. He quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his excellent leadership skills and tactical acumen. As the Recon Team Leader, he is responsible for gathering intelligence and planning covert operations behind enemy lines. Despite his reserved nature, he is deeply committed to his family and frequently sends money back to them in China.
